definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Job 30:14 bursting forth, breach; abs. ´[[פ]] Ju Jdg 21:15 +, [[פָָּרֶץ]] Ge 38:29 +; cstr. [[פֶּרֶץ]] 2Sa 5:20 +; pl. [[פְּרָחִים]] Am 4:3 +, [[פְּרָחוֹם]] Ez Eze 13:5, sf. [[פִּרְחֵיהֶץ]] Am 9:11 ([[פְּרָחֶיהָ]] We Now);—
bursting forth, out burst, of water 2Sa 5:20 = 1Ch 14:11; fr. womb Ge 38:29 (J).

breach in wall Am 4:3, 1Ki 11:27, Ne 6:1, Ps 144:14, Job 30:14; so (c. [[גָּדַר]], i.e. repair) Am 9:11, Is 58:12; fig. of effect to avert calamity, [[עָלָה בַּפְּרָחוֹת]] Ez Eze 13:5 (‖ [[גָּדַר]]), [[עָמַד בַּפֶּרֶץ]] Eze 22:30 (‖ id.), cf. Ps 106:23, by instruction and (esp.) intercession.
fig. of outburst of ´[[י]]'s wrath, acc. cogn. c. [[פָּרַץ]] 2Sa 6:8 = 1Ch 13:11, Job 16:14 ([[פֶּרֶץ עַל־פְּנֵי־פָָרֶץ]]); [[בְּ]] ´[[עָשָׂה פ]] Ju Jdg 21:15.
